f you’re looking for a super cute and really quick festive make, you’re going to love this crochet candy cane gift bag. it’s one of those easy, satisfying projects you can whip up in no time, and it’s perfect for gifting little treats, sweets, or tiny stocking fillers. 

the pdf is available free for 24 hours as part of the [quick crochet gifts blog hop][1].  visit the [pattern page][2] to find out how to get a free copy of the pdf.

  [2]: https://www.lullabylodge.com/2025/12/crochet-this-candy-cane-gift-bag.html
